price: 4. No hay ser humano que no tenga un ángel guardián (que registre sus acciones).
arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: in kullu nafsin lammā ʿalayhā ḥāfiẓun
